title: The Scarlet Plague
description: The Scarlett Plague by Jack London was first published in 1912, a tale a plaque that threatens to destroy mankind. Jack London is credited with being one of the first American authors to make a living strictly on writing, and is one of the fathers of the American Naturalism Movement. This novel is optimized for Kindle, including an active table of contents, page breaks and the original cover art.All the Kindle "go to" options are enabled.
author: Jack  London
